00045     public function getHeaders($bAsString = false) {
00046         $aHeaders = $this->aHeaders;
00047         if ($bAsString) {
00048             return !empty($aHeaders) ? implode("\r\n", $aHeaders) . "\r\n" : "";
00049         } else {
00050             return $aHeaders;
00051         }
00052     }

00060     public function getHeaderValue($sName) {
00061         foreach ($this->aHeaders as $sHeader) {
00062             if (stripos($sHeader, ':') !== false) {
00063                 list($sHeaderName, $sHeaderValue) = explode(':', $sHeader);
00064                 if (strtolower(trim($sHeaderName)) == strtolower($sName)) {
00065                     return trim($sHeaderValue);
00066                 }
00067             }
00068         }
00069         return null;
00070     }
